prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
ARCHANA RAVINDER
Email: archanar.ravinder@gmail.com
Phone: 9880372812
Professional Summary
10+ years of ASP.NET experience in analysis, design and development of web based application. Familiar with HTML, ADO.NET and CSS, worked extensively with web applications in Microsoft Visual Studio .Net using C#, ASP.NET, ASP.Net Core
Familiar with jquery.
Having working knowledge of all ASP.NET web controls. Have also created and used User Controls.
Improved the performance of applications by refactoring the existing code.
Familiar working with multi layered architecture with UI layer, Data access layer and Business Logic Layer.
Responsible for Database Design, Database Maintenance and developing queries and stored procedures, views using SQL Server. Used Entity Framework, extensively used LINQ to SQL queries
Have taken part in optimizing existing database queries and store procedures for efficient execution. 
Experience of designing and implementation of large-scale client/server three-tier distributed object oriented systems. 
Familiar with RDBMS concepts. Entity Framework, LINQ to SQL queries.
Excellent communication skills and problem solving skills, with the ability to work independently when required and also be an excellent team player.
Eagerness to learn new technologies and be an achiever.
Technical Skills
Languages:  C# .Net, VB.Net
Web: Asp.Net, Asp.Net Core, CSS, HTML5, ajax JQuery, Java Script, IIS
Tools: Visual Studio .Net 2013, 2010, 2008, 2005.
Technologies: Web Services, ADO.Net, .Net Framework (3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5)	
Testing Tools: QTP, ALM, Selenium RC
Database: SQL Server 2008/ 2005, Oracle
Awards
Awarded consecutive 2 years the best employee from LG Soft.
Educational Qualification
Post Graduate Diploma in Information Technology (PGDIT)  Symbiosis Center for Distance Learning (SCDL), India (2008-2010)
Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) Jyoti Nivas College Bangalore, India
 (2004-2007)
Three years Diploma from Aptech ADSE 2003-2007
Professional Experien
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
